author: AyushP123
body:
Hi,
     I was using scp on PowerShell for transferring a large number of images ( approx 2 lakh ) to a hard drive. After 10 - 15 minutes, the scp transfer starting throwing eother error. I did refer to [this GitHub isse](https://github.com/PowerShell/Win32-OpenSSH/issues/1209) and thought that it was resolved.  Please let me know if there is a workaround.
title: eother error thrown while using scp for large file transfer
